headline: Mosaic Announces Agreement to Sell Mosaic Potash Carlsbad Inc to International Minerals Carlsbad, LLC
summary: TAMPA, FL / ACCESS Newswire / December 22, 2025 / The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) today announced that it has signed a definitive agreement to sell Mosaic Potash Carlsbad, Inc., including the operations, assets and liabilities of the Mosaic mine in ...
